high_descs: Go right across the room and walk to the desk, turn right and walk to the bed, walk left toward the door, walk right toward the dresser, walk left toward the door, walk right to the dresser.
Pick up the pen on the dresser.
Turn left, turn right to the dresser
Turn on the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Get the pen and turn on the light

high_descs: Turn around, walk towards the far wall, then make a right to reach the dresser in the corner.
Pick up the pen next to the lamp.
Turn on the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Look at a pen under a lit lamp.

high_descs: Turn right and ahead, then veer right to the dresser at the foot of the bed.
Pick up the black and white pen on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Look at a pen by the light of a lamp.
